aboutpara: I am a Software Engineering student with a solid foundation in mathematics. I am eager to learn and grow, and I am always ready to take on challenging opportunities that will allow me to further developmyskills. I am confident that my strong technical abilities, coupled with my dedication and passion for learning, make me an assetin any software development environment. I am looking forward to working alongside experienced professionals in the field and contributing to innovative projects.
name: Diogo Gonçalves

projects.description: A university project that involved the development of a web application for bidding on cars. The project was implemented using dotNet.
projects.title: Car Auction

projects.description: A university project that involved the development of a web application for a restaurant. The project was implemented using React.
projects.title: Restaurant

projects.description: A university project that involved the development of a web application for a hotel. The project was implemented using React.
projects.title: Hotel

education.universityName: Faculdade de Ciências da Universidade do Porto

experiences.bullets: Blockchain Project: I was involved in the development of an open-source online casino platform using blockchain technology. The project was implemented using Solidity focusing on creating a transparent and fair gaming platform. This experience significantly enhanced my technical skills in blockchain development and Solidity., AI Project: Parallel to the blockchain project i also worked on an AI-centric project. This involved integrating the OpenAI API and an in-house AI into our systems. My contributions were primarily on the backend working with technologies like Rust and PostgreSQL.
